price: İşte bu, Allah’ın bir lütfudur. Bir bilen olarak Allah yeter.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
